name: All Out of Controls
description:
"All Out of Controls" is a 2D top down puzzle game where you must place your Direction Keys on specific board tiles to solve the puzzle. However, by doing so you lose the ability to move in that direction.

I created this game solo. I programmed it with Monogame and C#, created the artwork in Aseprite, and built the levels in Tiled. I reused some generic code from a previous project, but I created all of the game logic/artwork for this game during the jam. I downloaded the sounds from freesound.org. Thanks for playing!

-mattmd
